actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act to 1973 to establish an Office of Youth Employment in the Department of Labor to administer youth programs under that Act.

summary.text: Youth Counseling and Employment Act - Amends the section of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 which authorizes assistance for Youth and other special programs to establish a Youth Employment Office within the Department of Labor to administer the youth programs under such section. Directs the United States Employment Service to provide employment counseling and placement services for youth. Requires that the State plans submitted in order to receive assistance for public employment services be amended to include provision for the development and promotion of employment opportunities, job counseling, and job placement for youths.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act to 1973 to establish an Office of Youth Employment in the Department of Labor to administer youth programs under that Act.
